attributes.action: Restrict lock-in contracts with mobile phone companies for lengthy periods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Phone contracts used to be for a year. Simple. Companies are now putting in the small print 18 months, sometimes 24 months and many people are not aware of this before signing as they are misinformed - sometimes even encouraged to sign into one and do an insurance 'scam' to get out early, as I was advised.
